channel.title: [317] NPC Teleport, and Ice Barrage Time! Please help!
channel.description: You know how Zaff or one of the mage sellers has a teleport option how do I make him teleport me to the coords (xxxx, yyyy) that I choose? And secondly, how do I change the time for the freeze on the Ice Barrage? The source is a 317 EvolutionX if you are wondering. ;D Thanks for taking your time to read over it, -Jim

item.title: [317] NPC Teleport, and Ice Barrage Time! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @deery50 deery50
item.description:
@deery50 wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:6, topic:367657”]~Bump~

I only know what to do for the first and second click option on a person This would be great to have on 317s for things like Rune Essence and Abyss teleporting. :D[/quote]
Lol how would you do that? Because maybe we could work on making a packet for the third option

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

[quote=“deery50, post:4, topic:367657”][quote author=agfy25 link=topic=463810.msg3392719#msg3392719 date=1289086503]

see if you can find a packet called npcoption3, if not then i am sorry, i am not familiar with evolutionx

Uhh I couldn’t find that but if you tell me the way you do it in 317 I could probably make it work with this EvoX. I can usually find what you are talking about.
[/quote]
Maybe there is a case in the client, I really can’t help i am sorry, i am not the best coder[/quote]
Can anyone help please?
